comment:
Caramel & vanilla on the nose.  Very sweet

Palate’s the same, but lesser so.  A bit underwhelming at the beginning, but as it sits it opens up quite a bit.
 
Finish is very short, w/ a mild warming.

Nose- Very sweet on the nose. 
Body- corn sweetness comes through with a black pepper spice
Finish- Earthiness and black pepper continue, gradually fading to sweet grass
BBF tasting. Amazingly smooth with great flavors
Amazing how much this bourbon finishes with a strong coconut flavor. Smooth. Easy drinker.
Maple, vanilla, cherry, sweet finish, oak finish
Burn at the end.  Very smooth on the pallet.  Smell of oak.  For 62.00 well worth it.
Expected more flavor, does finish with a hint of spice, which fades in the mouth not down the throat.  Pick up hints of banana and oak.

Nose is mild but nice, sweet, butterscotch. Taste is nice and balanced, nothing is jumping out it’s just mellow and awesome. Well rounded honey, sweet corn, minty, creme brûlée, toffee. Finish is very pleasant, not overly long, with a little corn sweetness
butterscotch, vanilla, custard, and caramel, finished in a nice spice on the tongue that doesn’t follow into the throat. Nice way to finish a meal!

Very sweet nose
Leather vanilla front
Soft finish with a hint of spice
